title: Subpart 325-4 - Authorization Of Hospitals And Health Maintenance Organizations
content:
Subpart 325-4 - Authorization Of Hospitals And Health Maintenance Organizations

State Regulations
§ 325-4.1 - Authorization of hospitals and health maintenance organizations to provide out-patient medical care
§ 325-4.2 - Duties of hospitals and health maintenance organizations
§ 325-4.3 - Failure to treat
§ 325-4.4 - Inspections and investigations by the department of health

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
